archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Support Asset Assurance Operations
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Support the Asset Assurance Operations processes by reviewing requirements for infrastructure to support the operational processes, and monitoring, and reporting on the capability of the Asset Assurance Operations processes.

properties.value: The objectives of the Support Asset Assurance Operations processes are twofold: â€¢support the Manage Margin Assurance Operations processes by managing requirements for infrastructure to support the operational processes, and â€¢monitoring, managing and reporting on the capability of the Manage Margin Assurance Operations processes
